privatepp-lockout-prevented: Error message shown when the user tries to save a page containing {{#allow-groups:some-group-the-user-is-not-a-member-of}}. Parameters: * $1 is the user-supplied group string (can be pipe-separated to include multiple groups, e.g. sysop|bureaucrat or just a single group, like sysop) * $2 is the amount of groups
